rules_text:
Wayfarer [i](If you’ve spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L’Or.)[/i]
When Current Pacer enters the battlefield, draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn.
{4}{R}{G}: Shuffle, then exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. If you’ve discovered L’Or, you may play them this turn without paying their mana costs.
